title: My Wes Bos 30
author: Ricardo Moreira
body:
# **What it is?**

After I finished the Wes Bos [course](https://beginnerjavascript.com/) about Javacript I decided to revist his free [course](https://javascript30.com/) and try to add my own take on his projects.
The first time I did the 30 days of Javascript I had created my own versions of some of his projects(more on than on the detailed explanation of each project) but mostly all of I took them as a new project. So I created some set of rules for it


## Rules

 Normally I dedicate an hour and a half per day( Monday to Friday) to a course. 

* The transformation of Wes Bos project had to be taken in that time frame, meaning after I end up a lesson, I have an hour and a half max to change the project to my own vision. 
* Every day I have to start a new lesson/project
* The transformations have to do with the topics of the lesson
* It had to include in some way, more javascript or at least change the existent one 

## Links

* [Project page](https://goodstuffoodsgallery.netlify.app/)
* [GitHub page](https://github.com/mugas/MyWes30)
